columns.name: REQUEST_ID
columns.description: A unique request ID from the data replication service sequence.

columns.name: ITEM_NO
columns.description: A unique item number within a particular request.

columns.name: PARENT_ITEM_NO
columns.description: The parent item number within the request where nested tables are used.

columns.name: EXT_REF_ID
columns.description: An external reference for correlation purposes.

columns.name: ITEM_TYPE
columns.description: Item relates to a single table name.

columns.name: ITEM_NAME
columns.description: Table name if the item_type = TABLE.

columns.name: SELECT_LIST
columns.description: A comma-separated list of column names to limit selected data.

columns.name: TARGET_NO
columns.description: A reference to the corresponding external destination details in the drs_request_item_target table

columns.name: STATE
columns.description: The current status of request item.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The date/time the request item was started.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: The date/time once all parts are transported.

columns.name: OFFSET
columns.description: Used when paging through matching records.

columns.name: TOTAL_RESULTS
columns.description: The total number of records matching the given criteria. May be larger than actual returned count.

columns.name: TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT
columns.description: Total count of records in all parts for this item

columns.name: PARTITION_KEY
columns.description: The partition key for the purge process.

columns.name: ERROR_ID
columns.description: Contains the error details if the data export fails.

columns.name: SELECT_LIST_CLOB
columns.description: A comma-separated list of column names to limit selected data.
